author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Has Adam Savage ever changed his worldview after a formative experience? What's the best way to return to making after a major loss? Does Adam ever experience ADHD paralysis, and how does he manage to maintain his gratitude? In this live stream excerpt, Adam answers these questions from Tested members Furious Junker, Sirius Cyberntx, zanehodgenracing  ​​ and That Clyde, whom we thank for their support. 

00:00 Changing after formative experience
09:23 Making after a major loss 
12:19 Prolonged ADHD paralysis 
14:57 Maintaining gratitude

Enduring Love by Ian McEwan: https://amzn.to/3YkCYaJ
Works by Ram Dass: https://amzn.to/4pWi9ys
MBSR: https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC3336928/
Behind the Cannonball Incident: https://youtu.be/2L85aUPzimA

title: Only Total Despair Precedes a Change in Consciousness
